Package datamodel.categories

Class ModelCategory<T>

java.lang.Object
datamodel.categories.ModelCategory<T>
Type Parameters:
T - A generic type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Category<T>, Model<T>
public class ModelCategory<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Category<T>
A class that implements the Category interface. Saves the counts for the data in arrays of hashmaps and hashmaps. Saves a list of labels, the category name and the total number of labels
Since:
2020-05-06
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
Model, Category, ModelClassfication, TreeAugmentedNayveBayes

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.lang.String categoryName
    The name of the category: ex.
    protected java.util.List<T> labels
    A list with all the labels that were observed: example: 0, 1, 2
    protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>[] N_ijc
    An array of HashMap that considers in each position of the array a diferent parent for the current node Saves the N_ijc count, and its indexed by a String of type "i,j,c" in the correct hashmap depending on the parent of the node
    protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>[] N_ijkc
    An array of HashMap that considers in each position of the array a diferent parent for the current node Saves the N_ijkc count, and its indexed by a String of type "i,j,k,c" in the correct hashmap depending on the parent of the node
    protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> N_ikc
    An HashMap that save the N_ikc count, and its indexed by a String of type "i,k,c"
    protected int totalNumberLabels
    The total number of different labels this category has: example- 0,1,2 - totalNumberLabels = 3

  • Field Details

    • categoryName

      protected java.lang.String categoryName
      The name of the category: ex. X1

    • totalNumberLabels

      protected int totalNumberLabels
      The total number of different labels this category has: example- 0,1,2 - totalNumberLabels = 3

    • labels

      protected java.util.List<T> labels
      A list with all the labels that were observed: example: 0, 1, 2

    • N_ijkc

      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>[] N_ijkc
      An array of HashMap that considers in each position of the array a diferent parent for the current node Saves the N_ijkc count, and its indexed by a String of type "i,j,k,c" in the correct hashmap depending on the parent of the node

    • N_ijc

      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>[] N_ijc
      An array of HashMap that considers in each position of the array a diferent parent for the current node Saves the N_ijc count, and its indexed by a String of type "i,j,c" in the correct hashmap depending on the parent of the node

    • N_ikc

      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> N_ikc
      An HashMap that save the N_ikc count, and its indexed by a String of type "i,k,c"

  • Constructor Details

    • ModelCategory

      public ModelCategory​(java.lang.String categoryName, int numCategories)
      The constructor for the ModelCategory. Receives as parameters a string with the name of the category and the number of categories that is going to be considered (in order to instantiate the arrays that relates this category with others)
      Parameters:
      categoryName - A String with the category name : Ex("Color")
      numCategories - An int with the total number of categories - Ex.3 (Color, shape, age)
